document.discussion_title: Exclusive Sneak Peak of Jennifer Lawrence on the JOY BluRay
document.topic_text:
Exclusive Sneak Peak of Jennifer Lawrence on the JOY BluRay The director of the award-winning film JOY explains why the movie strikes a chord with entrepreneurs. CREDIT: Getty Images Advertisement I recently named the 2015 film JOY one of the 7 most motivational movies for entrepreneurs and suggested (when the Star Wars reboot came out) that entrepreneurs should go see JOY instead . So, yeah, I'm a fan of this movie. In fact, next week I'll be posting a podcast interview with Joy Mangano, the real-life entrepreneur played in the movie by the lovely and accomplished Jennifer Lawrence. Anyway, JOY is finally being released on BlueRay and digital media on May 3th , so I arranged with Fox Home Entertainment to get Inc.com readers a sneak peak at one of the digital extras! Here it is:
You saw it here first, folks! Stay tuned to this blog for the interview next week. It will be my first podcast and I think you'll be surprised. I'm doing something different than you might expect and Mangano is my first celebrity guest. Like this column? Sign up to subscribe to email alerts and you'll never miss a post.
